title: GM如何设置多世界权限组？
author: 阿舫
txt_content:
权限组是GM 多世界是MV
我在worlds文件夹里面添加了对应的世界spawn以及对应的users和grou文件
但没有效果我在spawn世界还是没用
是不是还要在config里面添加什么？

replies.author: Smile_Sun
replies.txt_content:
mirrors:
        # Worlds listed here have their settings mirrored in their children.
        # The first element 'world' is the main worlds name, and is the parent world.
        # subsequent elements 'world_nether' and 'world_the_end' are worlds which will use
        # the same user/groups files as the parent.
        # the element 'all_unnamed_worlds' specifies all worlds that aren't listed, and automatically mirrors them to it's parent.
        # Each child world can be configured to mirror the 'groups', 'users' or both files from its parent.
        world:
          world_nether:
          - users
          - groups
          world_the_end:
          - users
          - groups
          all_unnamed_worlds:
          - users
          - groups
          spawn: []复制代码
如果你想不同世界不同权限组权限，在spawn世界下删掉-groups
如果你想不同世界玩家所在的权限组不同，在spawn世界下删掉-users.

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
GM天生不支持设置全世界权限
建议换用luckperms

replies.author: 阿舫
replies.txt_content:

replies.author: Blood_Donors
replies.txt_content:
GM的话你得一个一个世界慢慢加我记得，
